name: Apocalypshit
description:
In post-apocalyptic Milan, most of the population has been victims of an apocalypse based on radioactive waste.

The latter come from monstrous creatures: gigantic intergalactic pink whales.

The protagonist, who will lead a group of outcasts, will have to survive facing the most disparate threats: lumpy monsters, obsessed fanatics, or warlike soldiers...

Narrative Design: Marco Lagiongada, Emma Lanteri, Tancredi Cavallari, Martina Salis

Game Design: Marco Lagiongada, Emma Lanteri, Tancredi Cavallari, Martina Salis

Programming: Marco Lagiongada, Emma Lanteri, Tancredi Cavallari

Environment Design, Marco Lagiongada, Emma Lanteri

Art: Marco Lagiongada, Martina Salis
